Operation 'quoteAirOffers' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, poor_ai_interpretability. The current summary is vague and the description is completely missing. The operation needs comprehensive documentation to help AI agents understand: (1) what it does (confirms/retrieves pricing), (2) what inputs are required (flight offers, optional traveler/payment data), (3) what outputs are returned (priced offers with detailed breakdowns), and (4) the operational context (validates availability, provides binding quotes). The improved description uses domain-appropriate terminology from the API context (FlightOfferPricingIn/Out schemas, price breakdowns, baggage allowances, terms and conditions) and clarifies the operation's purpose for AI agent decision-making.

data.summary_suggestion: Confirm and retrieve pricing for flight offers
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves confirmed pricing details for one or more flight offers. Accepts flight offer data and optional pricing parameters (such as traveler information and payment method preferences) to calculate final prices including taxes, fees, and applicable discounts. Returns priced flight offers with detailed price breakdowns, baggage allowances, terms and conditions, and payment information. This operation validates offer availability and provides binding price quotes for booking.
